text: Jeff Berry may refer to: * Jeff R Berry (genius) (born 1984), Highest ever score on the Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery * Jeff Berry (baseball agent) (born 1969), American attorney and baseball agent * Jeff Berry (footballer) (born 1957), Australian rules footballer * Jeff Berry (Ku Klux Klan) ( 1953–2013), former Klan leader * Jeff Berry (mixologist) (born c. 1958), American writer and historian of Tiki culture ==See also== *Jeff Barry (born 1938) American singer-songwriter and record producer *Jeff Barry (baseball) (born 1969), American baseball outfielder
title: Jeff Berry
